tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MedicalDeviceMonitoring (
   device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   device_name VARCHAR,
   device_type VARCHAR,
   monitoring_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
   usage_hours INT,
   performance_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalDevices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    usage_hours INT,
    last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE DeviceLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES MedicalDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalDevices (
 device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 manufacturer VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 purchase_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE DeviceUsage (
 usage_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 device_id UUID REFERENCES MedicalDevices(device_id),
 usage_date DATE,
 usage_hours INT,
 patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DeviceIssues (
 issue_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 device_id UUID REFERENCES MedicalDevices(device_id),
 issue_description TEXT,
 reported_date TIMESTAMP,
 resolved BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalDevices (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(255),
  device_type VARCHAR(100),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
  purchase_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE UsageLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  log_date TIMESTAMP,
  usage_hours INT,
  error_code VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  metric_date TIMESTAMP,
  temperature FLOAT,
  pressure INT
)

CREATE TABLE DeviceMaintenance (
  maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  technician_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE IssueReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  issue_description TEXT,
  reported_by VARCHAR(100)
)
